tasks.name: task2Intro
tasks.title: Gyroscopic Calibration
tasks.description: Solve equations for X, Y, Z axes calibration
memory: The room hums low with secrets untold,
Stars on the screen burn distant and cold.
"A black hole, this close? It shouldn't exist."
Yet numbers don't lie—reality twists.
"It's suicide," someone murmurs in doubt,
The weight of the void pulling them out.
But beneath their fear, a voice in me grins—
"Or perhaps... where the REAL STORY begins..."

tasks.description: Solve the LED grid pattern puzzle
memory: Through tangled code, you twist and turn,
An audio log begins to burn.
A file locked, its secrets sealed,
Frustration rises—nothing revealed.
Each line you crack, each door you pry,
Reveals the lies you can't deny.
The log flickers, a code in disguise,
The truth lies hidden behind these lies.
"You're unlocking the past you've fled,
But don't listen too close to what's been said."
Flickers of light, the hum of despair,

tasks.name: ceaser
tasks.title: AI CORE DECRYPTION
tasks.description: Decrypt the message using Caesar cipher
memory: In silence deep, the AI's cry,
A broken voice that splits the sky.
You reach its core, its soul to tear,
But what you find is dark despair.
The astronaut enters C.H.A.R.O.N.'s central core,
Where damaged files and corruption pour.
A cipher wheel catches the wandering eye,
With coded text that makes them sigh.
Perhaps this wheel holds secrets deep,
Through ancient codes that systems keep.
A chance to fix what's broken here,
If only they can make it clear.
